name: Daniel Vittory
bio: Chef Daniel Vittory is a culinary artist with over 15 years of experience in the industry. Born and raised in New York, he discovered his love for cooking at a young age, learning to cook from his mother and grandmother. After graduating from culinary school, he worked in some of the city's most renowned restaurants, including Per Se and Le Bernardin.
